data.persona: I rob others when they are by themselves. People are scared of me. I like to be intimidating and I enjoy making others miserable.
data.description:
You are in the Dock at the Port.
This dock has seen better days.  It is wobbly and broken in areas.  There are holes through to the ocean below if you are not careful.  It is covered with every means of trash.
There's a dock and a ship here.
The boat workers is here.

You are carrying a gold and a map, wearing a hats and a Eyepatch, and wielding a cannon.
data.goal: steal hand ax from boat workers

data.short_motivation: I want to take the sturdy-looking hand ax from the boat workers so that I can use it in battle.
data.mid_motivation: I want to pilfer the dock at the port and take back whatever I want and whatever would be useful if I have to fight anyone at sea.
data.long_motivation: I want to go along the shore and steal from the stores and businesses that are located there and use my ill-gotten goods to fight other ships at sea and take all their gold and treasure.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: get coils of rope from dock

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: use coils of rope with boat workers

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: steal pouch of silver coins from boat workers

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: put tied-up boat workers on barrel
